plot: Agressivity and the will to compete are also part of childhood. At a poor district's boxing club the kids live a close friendship and find a place to express a fury that is violent but liberating.
title: Fúria
plot_es: Agressivity and the will to compete are also part of childhood. At a poor district's boxing club the kids live a close friendship and find a place to express a fury that is violent but liberating.
plot_en: Agressivity and the will to compete are also part of childhood. At a poor district's boxing club the kids live a close friendship and find a place to express a fury that is violent but liberating.

produce.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema (ESTC)
